title: Reserve Bank of India to stick to higher digital deposit buffer proposal: Report
description: The Reserve Bank of India plans to maintain a 5% run-off factor on digitally linked deposits, despite industry requests for a lower buffer. This move aims to manage risks from quick withdrawals via internet or mobile banking, potentially impacting banks' liquidity and increasing demand for government bonds.
